title: MediaSource
description: A media source is what a content item belongs to. This can be a newspaper, a TV or a radio station, etc.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the media source.

type.description: The type of the media source.

name.description: A display name of the media source.

languageCodes.description: ISO 639-2 language codes this media source has content in.

datesRange.description: The range of dates this media source has content items for. This represents the earliest and the latest dates of the contet items.

articles.description: The number of articles in the media source.

issues.description: The number of issues in the media source.

pages.description: The number of pages in the media source.

id.description: The unique identifier of the property.
